title: Weeb Website
description: Responsive landing page for a product based on a mock-up with Figma.
goals: Implements designs created in Figma using modern web technologies.
Meets all the requirements of responsive design.
Provides fast loading on all devices.

title: React Todo App
description: A simple todo application built with React that allows users to manage their daily tasks.
features: Sort tasks by date or title
challenges: Managing local component state for multiple interactions
Creating a clean and accessible modal for editing tasks
Handling dynamic list rendering and updates

title: Sincos Admin Panel
description: Admin dashboard application built with Laravel and Blade templates to manage products and users.
architecture: MVC pattern with server-side rendering using Blade. RESTful routing and resource controllers for clean backend logic.
challenges: Customizing Blade layouts and partials for UI consistency
Integrating Tailwind with Laravel asset pipeline
Implementing secure CRUD operations for users and products
Consuming external DummyJSON API for dynamic content
Configuring and styling Laravel's pagination with Tailwind
